mapper.sql: id, login_name, login_pwd, user_name, id_card, mobile, qq, wechart, email, phone, education, job, reg_time, last_login_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, login_name, login_pwd, user_name, id_card, mobile, qq, wechart, email, phone, education, job, reg_time, last_login_time, update_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=BIT}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
